About this Website

This site has been designed and built by hand from the ground up. It's handled through Gatsby and animated with the fantastic Motion Animation Platform.

The CSS is written with Styled Elements, with a mobile first approach and fluid typography for a more meaningful typography.

Everything is optimised for speed, browser compatibility and SEO.

* Hosted on Netfily
* React Hooks
* Framer Motion for transitions
* Styled components with Styled theming
* PWA
* Offline Support
